title: Part One: Oskar Dirlwanger: The Worst Nazi
itunes:title: Part One: Oskar Dirlwanger: The Worst Nazi
description:
Robert is joined by Matt Lieb to discuss Oskar Dirlwanger. 

(2 Part Series) 

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://medium.com/lessons-from-history/oskar-dirlewanger-27b623301ced
  2. https://rcin.org.pl/Content/116922/WA303_145303_A453-SzDR-54-3-SI_Kuberski.pdf

  3. https://warisboring.com/the-vile-story-of-the-nazis-dirlewanger-brigade/

  4. https://books.google.com/books?id=GBQchepZ-7EC&printsec=frontcover&source=gbs_ge_summary_r&cad=0#v=snippet&q=mentally%20unstable&f=false
  5. https://www-tygodnikprzeglad-pl.translate.goog/masakra-woli/?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=en&_x_tr_hl=en&_x_tr_pto=wapp
  6. https://pure.bond.edu.au/ws/portalfiles/portal/29028675/Goldsworthy_Thesis.pdf
  7. https://www.thefifthfield.com/biographical-sketches/oskar-dirlewanger-2/
  8. https://www.warhistoryonline.com/world-war-ii/dirlewanger-a-child-molester-violent-alcoholic-sadist-war-criminal-was-kicked-to-death-by-his-guards.html?andro=1&chrome=1
  9. https://www.historytoday.com/archive/was-hitler-weak-dictator
  10. https://www.historyanswers.co.uk/history-of-war/the-battles-of-narvik-i-was-there/
  11. https://www.historyspage.com/post/was-adolf-hitler-the-total-master-of-the-third-reich-or-was-he-a-weak-dictator

  12. https://rm.coe.int/079317-queer-in-europe-during-the-second-world-war-web-web/16808e4a53
